title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Mathematical Inquiry for Critical Thinking via Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply explicit CT strategies (information analysis, hypothesis verification, logical reasoning) in mathematical problem-solving processes
Learners share and improve mathematical reasoning processes with peers using digital collaboration tools (online whiteboards, discussion platforms)

Learners compare/analyze three or more algorithmic approaches (e.g., divide-and-conquer, dynamic programming, greedy algorithms) and implement an optimal solution via pseudocode or actual code that meets two or more evaluation criteria (time complexity, space complexity, code readability)
Learners can critically evaluate the credibility of information generated in mobile learning environments and identify logical fallacies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
